data.name: Sample - Cloudflare WAF - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Cloudflare WAF" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: List Filters
workflows.description: Retrieve a list of filters configured within the Cloudflare Web Application Firewall (WAF) settings

workflows.name: Delete Firewall Rule
workflows.description: Remove or delete an existing firewall rule from the firewall configuration

workflows.name: List Firewall Rules
workflows.description: Get a list of firewall rules that are currently configured for your Cloudflare account or for a specific domain or zone within your account

workflows.name: Get IP Lists
workflows.description: Allows users to retrieve information about IP lists configured within their Cloudflare account

workflows.name: List Zones
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all zones associated with the user's Cloudflare account

workflows.name: Create Firewall Rule
workflows.description: Allows users to add or create a new firewall rule in a firewall configuration

workflows.name: Update Filter
workflows.description: Modify and update the configuration settings of existing filters within their WAF configuration

workflows.name: Update Firewall Rule
workflows.description: Allows users to modify or edit an existing firewall rule within the firewall configuration

workflows.name: Create IP List
workflows.description: Create a new IP list with a specified name and associated IP addresses.

workflows.name: Delete IP List
workflows.description: Remove an existing IP list from their Cloudflare account

workflows.name: Delete Filter
workflows.description: Allows users to remove a specific filter from their WAF configuration.

workflows.name: Create Filter
workflows.description: Allows users to add a new filter to their WAF configuration

params.description: Restrict access from these browsers on this address range

workflows.description: Add or append new items, such as IP addresses, to a specific list
workflows.name: Create IP Items List

arguments.title: Cloudflare WAF: Create IP Items List

workflows.description: Retrieves the list of IP addresses items from a specific list
workflows.name: Get IP List Items

arguments.title: Cloudflare WAF: Get IP List Items

workflows.description: Removes all existing items from the list and adds the provided items to the list.
workflows.name: Update IP List Items

arguments.title: Cloudflare WAF: Update IP List Items

workflows.description: Allows users to remove specific items, such as IP addresses, from an IP list
workflows.name: Delete IP List Items

arguments.title: Cloudflare WAF: Delete IP List Items
